Title: Relates to critical energy infrastructure security and responsibility
Summary: Relates to critical energy infrastructure security and responsibility; relates to the protection of critical infrastructure in the state.
LawCode: Amd §§3-101 & 1-103, Energy L; amd §709, Exec L; amd §66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, the executive law and the public service law, in relation to critical energy infrastructure security and responsibility
